channel.title: Some of my sword
channel.description:
Hello,
I have been on this forum(and R-S) for a long time now, and Blade said it's kinda empty at the model section so I am going to show of some of my weapons, mostly in a few topics,
rate plz! Beginner sword [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=192&u=13388320][img]http://i38.servimg.com/u/f38/13/38/83/20/beginn10.png[/img][/url]
Apprentice sword [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=194&u=13388320][img]http://i38.servimg.com/u/f38/13/38/83/20/aprent11.png[/img][/url]
Bended beginner sword [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=195&u=13388320][img]http://i38.servimg.com/u/f38/13/38/83/20/bended10.png[/img][/url]
Bended sword [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=196&u=13388320][img]http://i38.servimg.com/u/f38/13/38/83/20/bended11.png[/img][/url]
Sharp sword [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=197&u=13388320][img]http://i38.servimg.com/u/f38/13/38/83/20/sharp_10.png[/img][/url]
Whip [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=204&u=13388320][img]http://i38.servimg.com/u/f38/13/38/83/20/whip10.png[/img][/url]

item.title: Some of my sword
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Watch this video so you know why to not use n-gons and triangles. True this video is targeted to sub surfacing, but it is a good idea to start learning now. Get into the habit at a early stage.
http://www.guerrillacg.org/home/3d-polygon-modeling/subdivision-topology-artifacts

Read full topic

item.title: Some of my sword
item.dc:creator: @dutchdevil dutchdevil
item.description:
@dutchdevil wrote:

I just came up with these ideas and true, the can get more work but these are weapons for a replacement, so the should be basic in my opion, and yhea, i can model but i always have problems with the wireframe.

Read full topic

item.title: Some of my sword
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

I was about to point those ngons out… Beat me to it tribb. There’s also one on the bended beginner sword. As always, concepts need work, but the actual models are great.

Read full topic

item.title: Some of my sword
item.dc:creator: @Tribbinator Tribbinator
item.description:
@Tribbinator wrote:

Oh and, its cool that you use C4D, Im a fellow C4D user and enthusiast. But I only use it for the simplicity which is applicable to modelling for RSPS.

Read full topic

item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

Great to see your using primitives nice work.

Read full topic

item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Not bad. Very clean. Concepts could use some work. Not bad overall.
